title: Three Things I Did When My Father Died
description: Who trimmed all the hedges into lewd shapes? Why hasn't Wilthail changed in ten years? And why is Daniel Yearwood still ardently avoiding responsibility at the age of forty? Three Things I Did When My Father Died is a comedic chronicle of exactly that; Daniel Yearwood's desperate attempt to eke out a few more precious months of running from his past, and miserably failing at it.
author: Alex McKechnie
